requirements.summary: Add an additive Ringkasan V1 block in the existing Ringkasan tab that fetches and displays getSuperadminSummaryV1() with per-block refresh and minimal local state.
acceptanceCriteria: `SuperadminDashboard.tsx` includes a new Ringkasan section that calls `actor.getSuperadminSummaryV1()` only when the Ringkasan tab is active and the backend actor is ready.
The new Ringkasan V1 UI shows calm loading and error states without crashing the dashboard.
A per-section Refresh action re-fetches only the Ringkasan V1 summary data.
All newly introduced user-facing strings in this new UI block are in English.

file_operations.description: Append-only update: add new local state (`summaryV1`, `summaryV1Loading`, `summaryV1Error`) and an additive fetch function that calls `actor.getSuperadminSummaryV1()` only when `activeTab === 'ringkasan'`, `actorReady` is true, and the method exists. Render a new Ringkasan V1 summary block inside the existing Ringkasan tab UI, including a per-block Refresh control that re-fetches only this summary. Use existing shadcn-ui components already in use (e.g., Card, Button, Alert) for consistent layout and calm loading/error states; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Ensure all new user-facing strings in this new block are English, and do not refactor or change behavior/state of existing tabs beyond adding this block.

requirements.summary: Harden the Superadmin dashboard Ringkasan V1 block against anonymous/actor-initializing states and missing backend method shape at runtime, with calm English error handling.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend compiles successfully after the append-only additions.
When identity is anonymous, the Superadmin dashboard renders the existing login guidance view and does not call `getSuperadminSummaryV1()`.
When `actor` is null/undefined or `actorFetching` is true, Ringkasan V1 does not attempt backend calls and the UI remains stable.
If `actor.getSuperadminSummaryV1` is missing at runtime, the UI shows a calm English message instead of crashing.

file_operations.description: Additive runtime/compile sanity: guard Ringkasan V1 fetching with `!isAnonymous`, `!!actor`, `!actorFetching`, and `typeof actor.getSuperadminSummaryV1 === 'function'` checks. Ensure the Ringkasan V1 block uses try/catch to convert unexpected errors into a calm English message (no raw trap text surfaced), and keep the UI stable while actor is initializing. Use existing shadcn-ui Alert/Card patterns already used in this file for consistent error messaging; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
